name: Penassassin
description:
This is my first game made in the Godot engine.

You play as an penassassin named Talwaar 

Your mission (for which you don't have a choice but to accept it) is to infiltrate the the kingdom of citrine . 

It is a small platformer made in about 2-3 months. Hopefully the levels are fun although they are small, they took the major part of the time to make. 

Now go make your kingdom (the kingdom of ruby ) PROUD.

  1. A and W to move.
  2. Space to jump.
  3. S to PenStab.
  4. Esc to pause and look at your score

 - 100 score

  - 100 score when you kill this guy

  - avoid these scissors
